entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump 200  new covid-19 in Pennsylvania alone. Stop the “open by Easter” ramblings. Start truly caring about the people or resign. Enough of these selfish self interest desires. By the way, China is see a resurgence of new cases. Google it!
